items.sentence: Tom is planning to be at the party, isn't he?
Tom doesn't listen to classical music at all.
Tom isn't handling the situation well at all.
Tom became a car salesman, just like his dad.
Tom couldn't understand why I did what I did.
Tom often invites me to his house for dinner.
Tom tried the coat on to see if it would fit.
The last time I saw Tom was about a year ago.
Tom is the one that's been stealing our food.
Tom invited Mary to go to a concert with him.
